description: Microsoft has shared resources before the first hotpatch of Windows 11 is out. These resources include a new calendar and more. Read more...
title: First Windows 11 24H2 hotpatch is coming soon. Microsoft shares a bunch of useful stuff

description: JetBrains has brought its Compose Multiplatform UI toolkit for iOS to stable with 1.8.0, enabling developers to build production iOS UIs with the framework. Read more...
title: JetBrains brings Compose for iOS to Stable with Compose Multiplatform 1.8.0 release

description: Google is rolling out a new text simplification feature that makes jargon and technical concepts easier to understand. Read more...
title: Google app for iOS gets new AI-powered 'Simplify' text feature

description: Scientists conducted a study and it has uncovered a way to trick the mind into becoming fitness conscious. Read more...
title: Study finds a way to trick the mind so even the lazy can become fitness freaks

description: If you're a Samsung Wallet user in the US, a new feature called "Tap to Transfer" will be rolling out to you soon. Read more...
title: Samsung is bringing Tap to Transfer to Wallet in the US

description: One of Intel's Core Ultra 7 processors is currently available with a massive discount, saving you 27%. Read more...
title: Save over $100 on the Intel Core Ultra 7 265K processor

description: Bethesda has revealed the next update for Starfield. The May update will include many bug fixes, a new low-end graphics setting, and more. Read more...
title: Starfield May update adds support for larger Creations, a Very Low graphics setting and more

description: Scientists have invented a new EEG brain monitoring device that looks like a strand of hair on the head. Read more...
title: Scientists invent hair like brain monitor tech so nobody knows you're being mapped

description: Spotify is making it easier for creators as well as listeners to understand which podcast episode went viral. Read more...
title: You can now see how many people listened to each podcast episode on Spotify

description: Google says that overwhelming enthusiasm from developers led them to fast-track the Gemini 2.5 Pro Preview's launch. Read more...
title: Google releases upgraded Gemini 2.5 Pro weeks ahead of I/O event

description: Scientists have developed a new technique using the MRI to understand if your heart is beating too fast too soon. Read more...
title: Scientists develop MRI technique to measure if your heart is aging too fast for your good

description: Apple is bringing LEGO and UNO-inspired gaming titles to Apple Arcade with exclusive gameplay and mini-figures. Read more...
title: Apple Arcade June drop brings five new games, featuring LEGO and UNO

description: Rumors turned out to be true: Nvidia has just confirmed the launch date for the most affordable RTX 50 graphics card, the RTX 5060. Read more...
title: Nvidia reveals the launch date for the RTX 5060

description: Microsoft has confirmed that M365 services have gone down. The company is investigating and has released preliminary details. Read more...
title: Outage hits Microsoft 365 services again as Teams, Outlook, and more go down

description: The Surface Laptop 13-inch looks interesting with its smaller size, better battery life, and a lower price tag. But the spec-by-spec comparison with the Surface Laptop 7 paints a rather grim picture. Read more...
title: Specs Appeal: Comparing the Surface Laptop 13-inch with the Surface Laptop 7

description: Microsoft isn't slowing down its Game Pass additions. Following months of high-profile releases, the first half of May will bring the next Doom from id Software and much more. Read more...
title: Doom: The Dark Ages, Revenge of the Savage Planet, Xenoverse, and more reach Xbox Game Pass

description: Only a week following the major delay announcement, Rockstar has surprise-dropped the second trailer for Grand Theft Auto VI, showing off much more of Vice City. Read more...
title: Rockstar releases Grand Theft Auto VI Trailer 2 out of nowhere

description: After years of 13-inch Surface Pro tablets, Microsoft finally has a smaller-sized one. Here is how the new Surface Pro 12-inch compares to its bigger sibling spec-by-spec. Read more...
title: Specs Appeal: Comparing the Surface Pro 12-inch with the Surface Pro 11

description: Microsoft dropped a lot of new Windows 11 features today, and not all of them are exclusive to Copilot+ PCs. Some very interesting and useful changes are coming to the rest of Windows 11 users as well Read more...
title: Windows 11 gets a redesigned Start menu, text formatting in Notepad, and more

description: Some of the stock Windows 11 apps are about to become a lot better thanks to the new features Microsoft just announced. Read more...
title: Paint, Snipping Tool, and Photos in Windows 11 are getting a lot of new features

description: Windows 11 is getting more AI-powered experiences, and the one Microsoft announced today makes it easier to tweak various Windows settings by complaining about them. Read more...
title: You will soon be able to complain about something to Windows 11 and it will fix it for you

description: Microsoft has announced a new 13-inch Surface Laptop with a more affordable price, long battery life, and ultra-thin design. Read more...
title: Microsoft announces smaller and more affordable 13-inch Surface Laptop

description: Microsoft has a new member of the Surface Pro family: a smaller-sized Surface Pro with a more affordable price tag. Read more...
title: Microsoft unveils smaller-sized Surface Pro with a stunning new color

description: The company behind the popular Backbone mobile gaming controller is back with a major upgrade. The Backbone Pro is now available with full wireless play. Read more...
title: Backbone Pro controller unveiled with wireless support, full-size joysticks, and more

description: Windows 10 end of support is in six months and many PCs that are unsupported by Windows 11 won't be able to upgrade. A new Linux-backed project urges users to try installing Linux and shows how. Read more...
title: A Linux-backed project shows how to save unsupported Windows 10 PCs by installing Linux

description: The Brave browser on Android now lets you select any page elements that you'd like to block. This could come in handy if a certain part of the web page is causing a website to lag. Read more...
title: Brave for Android now lets you block elements, just like on desktop

description: Opera 89 for Android has just been released bringing loads of updates to the tabs experience. Read on to see what's new. Read more...
title: Opera 89 for Android comes with loads of tab improvements

description: Yamaha's RX-V4A and RX-V6A are 5.2-channel and 7.2-channel AVRs, and they are currently at their six-month low price. Grab them while the deals last. Read more...
title: Amazon deal: Yamaha 7.2 RX-V6A 5.2 RX-V4A Dolby Atmos/Vision AV receivers

description: Microsoft has bolstered the security of M365 Copilot Chat by integrating SafeLinks for eligible customers. It has added a more basic link checking feature for non-customers. Read more...
title: Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat gets SafeLinks protection and more

description: Microsoft has reminded its customers about the upcoming end of support for Windows 10. The company has listed ways you can deal with it. Read more...
title: Microsoft reminds of Windows 10 end of support that makes your PC insecure or obsolete

description: Microsoft has issued a temporary Group Policy fix for a bug that would not let admins upgrade a Windows 11 22H2 or 23H2 PC to 24H2 as they would run into a 0x80240069 error. Read more...
title: Microsoft shares Group Policy fix for bug that blocked Windows 11 24H2 on 23H2/22H2 PCs

description: Amazon has launched a free preview of its generative AI code assistant, Amazon Q Developer, directly integrated into GitHub and GitHub Enterprise Cloud. Read more...
title: Amazon Q Developer Gen AI code assistant now available on GitHub

description: Microsoft has officially launched its redesigned chat and channels experience in Teams for commercial users after extensive preview testing. Read more...
title: Microsoft's revamped Teams chat and channels experience now available to commercial users

description: Google inadvertently revealed details about its new design system, Material 3 Expressive, ahead of the Google I/O 2025 conference via a prematurely published blog post. Read more...
title: Google leaks Material 3 Expressive design language ahead of Google I/O 2025
